data.text: @RetiredDent Create example as to how you can lie with statistics and magnify things using a graph. Six fatalities per 1000,000 people is noise. More people die on the Vancouver streets of fentanyl overdoses on a regular basis.

@RetiredDent Stay inside till you die of old age then, dude.
#laCorona
@montrealdesign That distinction makes no difference to me. I don’t want to get it, dude.
@RetiredDent .. 'with Covid' dude .. they're dying with Covid not because of it.
@RetiredDent Yes! 😷Such a simple thing to do… https://t.co/miSrjmvsL8
